note.p: Death: Bedford Row, London (06 or 07 February 1785)
Burial: St George's porch of St Nicholas Church, Newcastle upon Tyne, Northumberland

Notes: His mural monument in the south wall of St Nicholas Church, Newcastle gives death date as 06 February 1785; GM gives 07 February 1785. On reverse of certificate: 'We whose Names are subscribed recommend Matthew Du Hayne Esqre upon our personal'
